alert.note: Alert for King George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 5:31PM EST until January 16 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Charles, Prince Georges and Anne Arundel Counties. In Virginia, King George County. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
